database module¶

class database.LibrarianDBackendSQL(args)¶

Bases: object

static argparse_extend(parser)¶
check_tables()¶
close()¶
create_bos(bos, commit=False)¶

Insert one new bos into “books_on_shelves” table. Input—

bos_data - list of bos data to insert
Output—
status: success = 0
failure = -1
create_shelf(shelf, commit=False)¶

Insert one new shelf into “shelves” table. Input—

shelf_data - list of shelf data to insert
Output—
shelf_data or error message
delete_bos(bos, commit=False)¶

Delete one bos from “books_on_shelves” table. Input—

bos_data - list of bos data
Output—
bos_data or error message
delete_shelf(shelf, commit=False)¶

Delete one shelf from “shelves” table. Input—

shelf_id - id of shelf to delete
Output—
shelf_data or error message
get_book_all()¶

Retrieve all books from “books” table. Input—

None
Output—
book_data or error message
get_book_by_id(book_id)¶

Retrieve one book from “books” table. Input—

book_id - id of book to get
Output—
book_data or error message
get_book_by_node(node_id, allocated_value, num_books)¶

Retrieve book(s) from “books” table using node Input—

node_id - id of node to filter on status - status of book to filter on num_rows - max number of rows to return
Output—
book_data or error message
get_bos_all()¶

Retrieve all bos from “books_on_shelves” table. Input—

None
Output—
bos_data or error message
get_bos_by_book_id(book_id)¶

Retrieve all bos entries from “books_on_shelves” table given a book_id. Input—

book_id - book identifier
Output—
bos_data or error message
get_bos_by_shelf_id(shelf_id)¶

Retrieve all bos entries from “books_on_shelves” table given a shelf_id. Input—

shelf_id - shelf identifier
Output—
bos_data or error message
get_nvm_parameters()¶

Returns duple(book_size, total_nvm)

shelf_id - id of shelf to get

shelf_id or error message

None
Output—
shelf_data or error message

book_data - list of new book data
Output—
